wikipedia_page.main: Christian Robert Honor (born 5 June 1968) is an English footballer, who played in the Football League for Bristol City, Torquay United, Hereford United, Swansea City and Cardiff City, and in the Scottish Football League for Airdrieonians and Partick Thistle. Honor played for Airdrieonians in the 1992 Scottish Cup Final, which they lost 2–1 to Rangers.
